name: Input with Mask
description: This component allows you add input with mask

properties.name: initValue
properties.label: Value
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the initial value of the input field.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the initial value of the input field.

properties.name: maskType
properties.label: Mask Type
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine type of mask(Number, String, RegExp).
properties.settingTooltip: Allows select type of mask(Number, String, RegExp).

properties.name: mask
properties.label: Mask
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine mask.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to specify the mask. 0 - any digit; a - any letter; * - any char. Or you can write RegExp.

properties.name: maskEnum
properties.label: Enum
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the list of strings that are enabled to write in the input field.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the list of strings that are enabled to write in the input field.

properties.name: dateFormat
properties.label: Date Format
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the format of date when the Mask Type is Date.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the format of date when the Mask Type is Date.

properties.name: dynamicMask
properties.label: Dynamic Mask
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the array of masks. Dynamic mask automatically selects the appropriate mask from a provided array of masks. The mask with the largest number of fitting characters is selected considering the provided mask order.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the array of masks. Dynamic mask automatically selects the appropriate mask from a provided array of masks. The mask with the largest number of fitting characters is selected considering the provided mask order.

properties.name: blocks
properties.label: Blocks
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the nested masks.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the nested masks.

properties.name: definitions
properties.label: Definitions
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the custom definition of the mask pattern.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the custom definition of the mask pattern.

properties.name: displayChar
properties.label: Display Char
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the character that will be displayed instead of the entered character.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the character that will be displayed instead of the entered character.

properties.name: placeholderChar
properties.label: Placeholder Char
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine a placeholder character.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to specify placeholder char. If it is left empty, the default value will be `_`.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine a placeholder.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to specify placeholder.

properties.name: min
properties.label: Min
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the min number that can be input.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the min number that can be input

properties.name: max
properties.label: Max
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the max number that can be input.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the max number that can be input.

properties.name: from
properties.label: From
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the number from which you can input in the field when MaskType has a value of Range.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the number from which you can input in the field when MaskType has a value of Range.

properties.name: to
properties.label: To
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the number to which you can enter in the field when MaskType has a value of Range.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the number to which you can enter in the field when MaskType has a value of Range.

properties.name: thousandsSeparator
properties.label: Thousands Separator
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the thousands separator.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the thousands separator.

properties.name: normalizeZeros
properties.label: Normalize Zeros
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler of the logic to determine if the redundant zeros should be removed at the ends.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine if the redundant zeros should be removed at the ends.

properties.name: scaleNumber
properties.label: Scale of Number
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the count of numbers after the comma.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the count of numbers after the comma.

properties.name: radix
properties.label: Radix
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the separator of a float number.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the separator of a float number.

properties.name: mapToRadix
properties.label: Map to Radix
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the symbols to process as radix.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the symbols to process as radix.

properties.name: padFractionalZeros
properties.label: Pad Fractional Zeros
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the fractional zeros should be added.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine if the fractional zeros should be added.

properties.name: lazy
properties.label: Lazy
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine a lazy. If lazy is true mask is not visible, and if lazy is false mask visible, but if the mask is visible, the input value includes the mask.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to specify lazy or not lazy. Lazy it's when the input doesn't display the template of the mask. For example, Mask: `000 000 000`, Placeholder Char: `_`, Lazy: `checked` input will be empty, but if Lazy: `unchecked` input will be `___ ___ ___`

properties.name: overwrite
properties.label: Overwrite
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine whether to enable or disable character overwriting (replacement or offset) instead of insertion.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine whether to enable or disable character overwriting (replacement or offset) instead of insertion.

properties.name: eager
properties.label: Eager
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine how to behave around undefined mask characters.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine how to behave around undefined mask characters.

properties.name: autofix
properties.label: Autofix
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the auto-fix should be.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine if the auto-fix should be.

properties.name: skipInvalid
properties.label: Skip Invalid
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the invalid value should be skipped.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine if the invalid value should be skipped.

properties.name: variant
properties.label: Variant
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to choose one of three style variants - outlined, standard, or filled.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to choose one of three style variants - outlined, standard, or filled.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.label: Read Only
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the input should be read-only. When the handler returns true, the component becomes read-only.
properties.settingTooltip: Determines if the input should be read-only.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the component should be disabled. If the handler returns true, the component will be disabled.
properties.settingTooltip: Determines if the component should be disabled.

eventHandlers.name: onChangeValue
eventHandlers.label: On Change Value
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the component's state (value) changes.

eventHandlers.name: onValidate
eventHandlers.label: On Validate
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered before the component value changes. Using this event we can additionally ourself check and modify each symbol that we input.

eventHandlers.name: onComplete
eventHandlers.label: On Complete
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the value is completely filled. This makes sense only for custom masks.

eventHandlers.name: onFocusEvent
eventHandlers.label: On Focus Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the component receives the focus for data entry or by pressing the TAB key.

eventHandlers.name: onLostFocusEvent
eventHandlers.label: On Lost Focus Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the component loses focus.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseEnter
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Enter
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the mouse enters the component.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseLeave
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Leave
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the mouse leaves the component.
